content: knit something extra magical for your pup this holiday season with the christmas elf dog sweater knitting pattern this festive knitted dog sweater features bold red green and white stripes a cozy ribbed neck and the option to add sleeves perfect for winter walks christmas photos and snuggly evenings at home this dog sweater knitting pattern is worked in chunky/bulky yarn on 6 mm us 10 needles and uses simple stitches stockinette and 1x1 rib making it an enjoyable project for confident beginners and experienced knitters alike the pattern includes three sizes small medium and large and can be easily adjusted for body length and chest width so you can customise the fit for your dog *please note - the neck is joined to knit in the round **materials needed ** yarn bulky/chunky/12-ply yarn that works with 6 mm us 10 needles sample shown alize lanagold classic 49% wool / 51% acrylic 240 m / 262 yds per 100 g colours used yarn a green shade 29 yarn b white shade 62 yarn c red shade 56 approximate yarn requirements total small 100 g approx 240 m / 262 yds medium 150 g approx 360 m / 393 yds large 170 g approx 400 410 m / 445 yds balls needed all sizes yarn a green 1 x 100 g ball yarn b white 1 x 100 g ball yarn c red 1 x 100 g ball needles 6 mm us 10 knitting needles for working flat 6 mm us 10 circular needles or dpns for knitting the neck and sleeves in the round **skill level** confident beginner / easy intermediate you should be comfortable with casting on and binding off knit and purl stitches working 1x1 ribbing and stockinette stitch simple increases and decreases knitting flat and in the round basic seaming and picking up stitches **sizing** pattern includes three sizes small medium large the length of the body and the width of the chest are easily adjustable finished measurements approx with ribbing relaxed small s chest width at widest point 7 8 in / 18 20 cm chest/body circumference 14 16 in / 36 41 cm back length excluding collar 11 5 in / 29 cm medium m chest width at widest point 10 12 in / 25 30 cm chest/body circumference 20 24 in / 51 61 cm back length excluding collar 15 5 in / 39 cm large l chest width at widest point 15 16 in / 38 41 cm chest/body circumference 30 32 in / 76 81 cm back length excluding collar 18 5 in / 47 cm you can lengthen or shorten the body and neck within the pattern instructions to customise the fit for your dog
